channel.title: No-IP server
channel.description: OK, this is my first No-IP server. I made a HAM one, but I wanna move up to No-IP. I got to my router and made the channels...but idk what to put for the IP, it won't let me put 2 or 0.0.0.0...BTW I am using a D-link 624. Should I put my IP in there?

item.title: No-IP server
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

OK, this is my first No-IP server. I made a HAM one, but I wanna move up to No-IP. I got to my router and made the channels…but idk what to put for the IP, it won’t let me put 2 or 0.0.0.0…BTW I am using a D-link 624. Should I put my IP in there?

Read full topic
